assignment3

Class Buffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • assignment3.Buffer

  • public class Buffer
extends java.lang.Object
    Buffer class that receives FoodItems from different Producers and send them along to different Consumers
    Author:
    Mikael Lindfors

    • Method Detail

      • updateProducerStatus

        public void updateProducerStatus(FoodItem item,
                                 java.lang.String status)
        Method used for updating Producer-status in the GUI.
        Parameters:
        item - FoodItem, used for identify which producers status is going to updated.
        status - String status text

      • updateConsumerStatus

        public void updateConsumerStatus(java.lang.String consumer,
                                 java.lang.String status)
        Method used for updating Consumer-status in the GUI.
        Parameters:
        consumer - String used for identify which consumers status is going to be updated.
        status - String status text.

      • push

        public void push(FoodItem item)
        Push method that adds an FoodItem to the queue. WriteSemaphore is queue's maxcapacity while only 1 producer might enter the critical section (mutex).
        Parameters:
        item - FoodItem to be added to queue

      • pop

        public FoodItem pop(java.lang.String consumer)
        Pop method that removed an FoodItem from the queue. ReadSemaphore starts at 0 (No access, until an FoodItem has been pushed to the queue).
        Parameters:
        consumer - String used for identifying which Consumer is using the method.
        Returns:
        FoodItem
